"Hilda": "Stop. That's where we've isolated the powerful Darker that showed up earlier."
"We were planning to take care of it once the battle was under control."
"Ah! There's a breach in the southern bulwark! That big Darker is trying to break through!"
"I guess we overestimated how long we could hold it. I need you to go buy us some time."
"I'll open up the bulwark so you can get through."
